data.title: All Poets/Writers From Punjab List
data.meta_description: Find all Poets/Writers From Punjab List with their poetry, Sher, Ghazals, Nazms in Hindi, English & Urdu. Listen and Watch Audios, Videos.
data.text:
Born : Ludhiana

Domicile : Lahore

Died : Lahore

World-renowned Urdu fiction writers. Known for masterpieces like Thanda Gosht, Khol Do, Toba Tek Singh etc.

Born : Amritsar

Domicile : Lahore

One of the leading poets of new Urdu ghazal.

Born : Hoshiarpur

Domicile : Lahore

Died : Lahore

Popular poet from Pakistan, known for his anti-establishment poetry, having mass following.

Born : Jalandhar

Domicile : Lahore

Popular romantic poet made famous by Malika Pukhraj by singining ghazal "abhi to main jawan huun". Wrote the National Anthem of Pakistan.

Born : Hoshiarpur

Domicile : Lahore

One of the most outstanding modern poets who wrote both in Urdu and Punjabi. Also a film lyricist.

Born : Sarhind

Domicile : Lucknow

Known for Rekhti, a form of Urdu poetry where a poet speaks in language of women.

Born : Ludhiana

Domicile : Mumbai

Leading progressive Indian poet and celebrated film-lyricist. Popular for his writings against social injustice and backwardness in society

Born : Jalandhar

Domicile : Allahabd

A prominent story writer, a contemporary of Manto, also known for his radio plays.

Born : Gurdaspur

Domicile : Lahore

Died : Lahore

Prominent poet and journalist, also the editor of 'Zamindaar', an important newspaper of his times. Also authored 'Zikr-e-Iqbal' and 'Muslim Sahaafat Hindustan Mein'

Born : Hoshiarpur

Domicile : Rawalpindi

Well-known poet, also known for his poems written in the veneration of the prophet; decorated with Tamgha-i-Imtiyaz from Pakistan government

Born : Amritsar

Domicile : Lahore

Prominent Urdu and Punjabi poet and author, remained associated with major Urdu journal Adab-e-Lateef and Auraaq

Born : Barnala

Died : Mumbai

Dramatist, Theatre director, Novelist, and short story writer of the Punjabi Language

Born : Hoshiarpur

Died : Karachi

Popular poet famous for his widely-sung ghazal "mohabbat karne wale kam na honge, teri mahfil mein lekin ham na honge".

Born : Amritsar

Domicile : Lahore

A renowned Urdu writer, known for his humor and prose.

Born : Malsiyan

Domicile : Jalandhar

One of the most prominent poets in the undivided Punjab.Honoured with Padma Shri in 1971

Born : Sitapur

Domicile : Jalandhar

One of the most prominent contemporary poets, also having popular appeal.

Born : Jalandhar

Domicile : Jalandhar

Died : Delhi

Prominent among first generation of modernist poets, very close to Miraji

Born : Jalandhar

Domicile : Jalandhar

Died : Jalandhar

Major Punjabi revolutionary poet. His strongly left-wing views were reflected in his poetry. Killed by extremists at a young age.
